attributes.action: Stop the Housing and Planning Bill becoming legislation
attributes.additional_details:
Please read the Bill. It will affect EVERYONE who works for a living and rents accommodation anywhere in the country. Sign this petition now before it's too late.

http://www.publications.parliament.uk/pa/bills/cbill/2015-2016/0108/15108.pdf
attributes.background: The Housing & Planning Bill which is currently going through Parliament is not designed to address the housing crisis as the Government would have us believe but to make Cameron's property developer friends even richer. If this Bill passes, so does the death knell for social housing in this country.
